nearby.name: Nearby App

mundoInvertido.name: Mundo Invertido
mundoInvertido.description: Thematic landing page inspired by Stranger Things with light/dark theme system, Firebase Firestore integration for forms, and advanced CSS animations.

sms.name: SMS System
sms.description: Complete platform for sending and managing SMS with React dashboard, Laravel API, integration with Infobip, Google Directory API and TOTVS API. Includes message scheduling, reports and webhooks.
